Summary: Observed a saucer hovering above trees outside bedroom window

divs: sighting detailsit was summer, i know that, we had the windows open, i shared a bedroom with my brother. he slept next to the window and called me over - i remember he and i looking at this saucer - it must have been 60 feet in diamater, probably 12 feet thick - perhaps more, ringed with red\black lights, and underneath four larger light panels flashing primary colors. i vaguely remember thick glass panels with humanoids looking out of the craft. i estimate we were less than 40 yards away from the craft, hovering silently. i remember both of us breaking away from the window and running to our parents, who were disturbed that we were awake and wouldn't listen to our story. i was about 5 at the time, my brother was 7. we were both stunned - not even knowing what we were looking at - it was years later that the term ufo was heard by me - and i knew then that's what we saw - a ufo. my brother and i spoke about the event often. funny, we both experienced regular ( he more than i ) nosebleeds after that for many years. i've seen 2 now, the other in 1988\89 i was about 28 years old - i was in a field in macon, ga at night, and a silent rectangular craft passed overhead - again it was 20-40 yards away from me. about 50 feet long i guess 20 feet wide and perhaps 20 feet tall. many odd shaped lights surrounded the craft. this was around 9:30 at night - i was out in the field because a very rare occurance of the aura borealis was present that far south the night before, and i wanted to get away from the city to see if it re-occured. i saw it approaching - at first at a distance it looked like a small plane but it moved very slowly - and didn't make any sound. i watched and watched and wondered how it could fly so slow - thinking perhaps like me they were out and about looking to see the aura borealis too - but this 'plane' was coming at me in a straight line - but oh so slow. it was strange - real strange - very quiet - very still. object just passed overhead at about 30 mph - not a sound - just kept on moving until i lost sight of it. these aren't teeny tiny objects seen from a great distance - these craft (both of them) were seen at very close ranges - tree top level - very very close by - not to be mistaken by any other object or event.
